recipe.title: Sweet As Can Bean Baby Food (11+ Months) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 ; sweet potatoes, washed, peeled and cooked
16 oz ; white bean, rinsed well and drained, 1 can ; (455 g)
3 ; large carrots, washed, peeled and cooked
water, can use breast milk or formula

steps.step: Add sweet potato, white beans, carrots, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor. Blend very well.
Refrigerate up to 4 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add sweet potato, white beans, carrots, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor.
Refrigerate up to 4 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.
